Articles.Content: I am very new to ksp modding, I have made a few fuel tanks etc. but I want to make a add-on/mod that makes custom buttons to make something happen in the game. For example, I press "H" on my keyboard and it sets the throttle to 50%. Another thing that is not entirely necessary for what i'm trying to do but would help a lot is if it's possible to run if statements (and other things like that)  in add-ons to do something like, for example I press "H" 1 time and sets throttle to 50% then I press it again and it sets throttle to 70%. Is this possible? If it is, is there are place that has all the ksp modding documentation showing what each thing does?

for creating buttons.

find 'doubletapbrakes' - its a mod - great and simple, for doing something like you are saying.
